column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I have five daughters .
#Text=My oldest daughter is 19 and a freshman at IUPUI here in Indianapolis .
#Text=She 's our first proud graduate of Delph Academy for Girls .
#Text=She did really well her first semester of college , making the Dean 's List .
#Text=So mom and dad were obviously very ecstatic there .
#Text=I have a 17-year-old daughter , who just turned 17 .

#Text=She told dad that she wanted a boyfriend for her birthday , and so I went out and got a little stuffed animal of the good guy from Frozen [ a film ] , which I said you can take to bed with you every night and cuddle with .
#Text=So her name is Evelyn .
#Text=I have a 14-year old named Anna , a 10-year old named Emma , and my 7-year-old , who will probably — well her name is Lilly , that she believes she will be the next rock star of rock music .
#Text=And she and I play my guitar and sing every night .
#Text=So that 's a little bit about my family .
#Text=I work as general counsel for a second-generation family-owned business based out of Bloomington , Indiana , named CarDon & Associates .
#Text=And we are in the business of senior housing and long-term care , post-acute care , nursing homes , assisted-living facilities and independent living facilities .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=Behnke :
#Text=We understand that you and your wife home educate your children .
#Text=How did you decide to home educate your children ?
#Text=MD
#Text=: Well the name of our home school is the Delph Academy for Girls .
#Text=Originally my 19-year old was part of the Carmel school system and attended Carmel Elementary and had a real challenging year , her first grade year .

#Text=We were actually told by her first grade teacher that she would have a hard time graduating from high school and that college was not in the cards , which obviously was a lot for mom and dad to take with our first grader .
#Text=We went and had a battery of tests done .
#Text=And there was a dispute within the school system as to what , if any , learning disabilities that she might have , and what we should do about it .
#Text=So we finished out that school year and went a little bit into the next , and then we just made the decision as a family that we were n't going to fight the system .
#Text=We were going to take matters into our own hands and start homeschooling our daughter .
#Text=Then we just started homeschooling the rest of our kids .

#Text=It 's turned out to be a very big blessing in the life of the Delph family for obvious reasons because our daughter has turned around her academic life in a very positive fashion and is doing very well in college , as I mentioned before .
#Text=Another reason why we homeschool our students , is we teach Bible in our school .
#Text=And obviously you ca n't do that in the public school system .
#Text=Our faith and Christian values are very important to Beth and I and to our daughters .
